# Welcome {-}

Welcome to the bookclub! 

This is a companion for the book [_R Packages_](https://r-pkgs.org/) by Hadley Wickham and Jenny Bryan (2nd edition, copyright 2023).

-  These are **shared slides!**
   -  Developed by the [R4DS Online Learning Community](https://rfordatasci.com).
   -  [Join the community](https://r4ds.io/join) to participate.
   -  Available at [r4ds.io/rpkgs](https://r4ds.io/rpkgs).
-  We follow the [R4DS Online Learning Community Code of Conduct](https://r4ds.io/conduct).

## Pace {-}

-  Meet **every week.**
   -  Try to **always meet** even if presenter can't.
-  Meetings = **1 hour.**
-  Cover **1 chapter per week.**
   -  Exception: Chapter 3 is super short.
-  **Split content** if you need to!

## Format {-}

-  [**Volunteer to lead discussion!**](://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1C75auf7ceIt3zieY85Hmb1oVkVNtSzRoZTmSU7SVYRc/edit?usp=sharing)
   -  **This is the best way to learn the material!**
-  **Update shared slides**.
   -  Instructions in [github repo](https://github.com/r4ds/bookclub-rpkgs).
   -  **Embedded code** is almost always easier to follow than live demos!
-  Presentations **recorded** & available on [**R4DS Online Learning Community YouTube Channel**](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL3x6DOfs2NGjSSjJdHz4uqeAxqiuBSEaz).
-  **Camera** is **optional,** but **encouraged.**
-  If we need to **slow down** and discuss, **let me know.**
   -  Most likely someone has the same question 
   -  We are all here to learn 

## Introductions {-}

If you feel comfortable sharing, unmute or raise your hand!

-  **Who** are you?
-  **Where** are you joining from?
-  **Previous clubs?**
-  **How long** have you been using R?
-  **What** are you most looking forward to learning?

## git and GitHub {-}

-  **Git/GitHub** (version control) = **valuable skill.**
   -  Discussed more in **Chapter 21.**
-  If you present, best to **integrate your materials** into this bookdown version.
-  You'll need a **GitHub account** to submit modifications.
-  **Full instructions** in [GitHub repository](https://github.com/r4ds/bookclub-rpkgs) ("repo").

## Group Question 1 {-}

(Submit answers in chat)

On a scale from 1 - 5, how familiar are you with using git for version control?

1 = Not at all familiar (a true beginner)

to

5 = Very familiar (use git everyday/can handle a merge conflict like a pro)
